Title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
Director: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath, Conrad Vernon
Writer: Eric Darnell (screenplay by), Noah Baumbach (screenplay by), Alejandro Bien-Willner (punch-up writer)
Actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith
Plot: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal control officer.
